title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Douglas DC6 - Find the manual and hidden gems
description:
In this how to we are going to look where you can find the documentation for the DC6. As most of you know having and reading the documentation is critical prior to flying an aircraft. In some cases you might be able to take off and land without reading it but to use the aircraft in full potential reading the manual is a must.

Besides showing you where you can find the manual I will show you also some hidden gems.
